About Me

Frontend Developer & UI Enthusiast

With 2+ years of professional experience at Dark Grace LLC, I've successfully delivered 15+ projects ranging from e-commerce platforms to complex web applications.

I specialize in creating pixel-perfect, responsive designs using modern technologies like React, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript ES6+. My focus is on delivering exceptional user experiences that drive business growth.

When I'm not coding, I'm exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and mentoring aspiring developers in my community.
